remarks: The orthocomplement of a co-atom (lattice hyperplane) is an atom. (Contributed by NM, 18-May-2012.)
statement:
lhpoc.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lhpoc.o $e |- ._|_ = ( oc ` K ) $.
lhpoc.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
lhpoc.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lhpoc $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. B ) -> ( W e. H <-> ( ._|_ ` W ) e. A ) ) $.
